racers.name: The Racing Circuit
racers.description: Adrenaline junkies who bond over speed, mechanics, and competition.

academy_students.name: Link City Academy Students
academy_students.description: Young residents focused on education and social hierarchy.

corporate_elite.name: The Gilded Circle
corporate_elite.description: The wealthy elite who rule Link City from the high towers.
corporate_elite.philosophy: Power is the only currency that matters.

underground.name: The Circuit Underground
underground.description: Rebels, outcasts, and survivors who live outside the corporate system.
underground.philosophy: Survive together, trust no one else.

digital_natives.name: The Glitch Collective
digital_natives.description: Entities born from code, hackers, and those who blur the line between physical and digital.
digital_natives.philosophy: Information is life. Connection is survival.

creatives.name: The Aesthetic Vanguard
creatives.description: Artists, performers, and visionaries dedicated to expression.
creatives.philosophy: Create beauty in a broken world.

caretakers.name: The Quiet Keepers
caretakers.description: Healers, guardians, and those who tend to the broken.
caretakers.philosophy: To heal is to rebel against entropy.
